akn:subsection.akn:heading: Availability of lands among rail properties

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Availability of lands among rail properties Lands among the rail properties of the Alaska Railroad shall not be—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Review and settlement of claims; administrative adjudication; management of lands; procedures applicable

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Review and settlement of claims; administrative adjudication; management of lands; procedures applicable

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Judicial review; remedies available; standing of State

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Judicial review; remedies available; standing of State

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Liability of State for damage to land while used under license

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Liability of State for damage to land while used under license The State shall be liable to a party receiving a conveyance of land among the rail properties of the Alaska Railroad subject to the license granted pursuant to section 1203(b)(1)(C) of this title for damage resulting from use by the State of the land under such license in a manner not authorized by such license.
